page.title: 20LUDFORD _ WILDLIFE
page.content: Being very rural there is wide variety of wildlife. Plenty of Foxes, Badgers, Rabbits, Hares, Stoats, Weasels, Hedge hogs, Moles, Voles, Rats, Field Mice, Fish, Lizards, Newts,Snakes. Pheasants Partridge, Wild Duck, House & Sand Martins, Swallow, Robin, Wren,Seagulls Sparrows, Blackbirds, Owl, Cuckoo,Teal Tufted Duck, Mistle & Song Thrush,Gold Finch, Swift, Kestrel, Pied Wagtail, Woodpecker, Yellow Hammer, Bull Finch, Chaffinch, Great & Blue Tits to name a few. Geese often fly over. Whilst weed killers threaten many wild flowers many are still to be found including wild orchids and the fruits of the countryside, Blackberries, Sloes, Crab apples, mushrooms, Elder berries and flowers for Home made Wine which country people still make _ even with dandelions and nettles.The countryside lives on whatever man may do.
